report.title: Score review
report.description: A report which lists all Pantheon species along with old and proposed scores.
report.query: select #columns# from pantheon.species_index si join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=si.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttdt join pantheon.designation_mappings dmt on dmt.taxon_designation_id=ttdt.taxon_designation_id and dmt.mapping_class='IUCN Threat listing' ) on ttdt.taxon_id=cttl.taxon_id and ttdt.deleted=false left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttdr join pantheon.designation_mappings dmr on dmr.taxon_designation_id=ttdr.taxon_designation_id and dmr.mapping_class='GB Rarity listing' ) on ttdr.taxon_id=cttl.taxon_id and ttdr.deleted=false left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttdall join taxon_designations tdall on tdall.id=ttdall.taxon_designation_id and tdall.deleted=false ) on ttdall.taxon_id=cttl.taxon_id and ttdall.deleted=false where 1=1 #filters#

column.name: proposed_score
column.sql: case when array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', 'Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['CR', 'CR(PE)', 'RE', 'pCR'] then 32 when (array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', 'Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['EN', 'pEN']) then 16 when array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', 'Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['VU', 'pVU'] then 8 when (array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Rare', 'Nationally Rare (marine species)', '[Rare]'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['LC', 'NA', 'DD', 'NT', 'pLC', 'pDD', 'pNT']) then 8 when array_agg(dmr.output_label::text) && array['Nationally Scarce', 'Nationally Scarce (marine species)'] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['LC', 'NA', 'DD', 'NT', 'NT'] then 4 when array_agg(dmr.output_label) = array[null::varchar] and array_agg(dmt.output_label::text) && array['LC', 'NA', 'DD', 'NT', 'VU', 'EN', 'CR', 'CR(PE)', 'pLC', 'pDD', 'pNT', 'pVU', 'pEN', 'pCR'] then 1 when array_agg(tdall.code::text) && array['RDB 1', 'pRDB 1'] then 16 when array_agg(tdall.abbreviation::text) && array['RDB 2', 'pRDB 2', 'RDB 3', 'pRDB 3', 'Notable', 'Notable-A', 'Notable-B'] then 8 when array_agg(tdall.abbreviation::text) && array['RDB I', 'RDB K'] then 4 else 1 end
